## Prerequisites for the course

- Basic Python programming knowledge
- Some experience with a Python dataframe library (either Pandas or Polars)
- Knowledge of the basic concepts of machine learning
    - Pre-processing (scaling, imputation)
    - Feature engineering
    - Classification, regression
- Some experience with scikit-learn and how it can be applied to machine learning
problems.
